mapper.select: select * from client where clientId=#{clientId};
select * from t_rp_productiondaily_inbounditem where productionDailyId=#{id};
select * from t_rp_productiondaily_outbounditem where disposalEquipment='A2' and productionDailyId=#{id};
select * from t_rp_productiondaily_outbounditem where disposalEquipment='B2' and productionDailyId=#{id};
select * from t_rp_productiondaily_outbounditem where disposalEquipment='Prepare2' and productionDailyId=#{id};
select * from t_rp_productiondaily_outbounditem where disposalEquipment='ThirdPhasePretreatmentSystem' and productionDailyId=#{id};
select count(*) from t_pr_sewageregistration where water="1";

select * from t_pr_sewage order by receiveDate desc
limit #{start}, #{count}

select * from t_pr_sewageregistration
or id like "%"#{keywords}"%" or address like "%"#{keywords}"%" or sendingPerson like #{keywords} or laboratorySignatory like #{keywords} or checkState = #{keywords} and water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.ph=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.lye=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.cod=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.bod5=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.n2=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.nitrogen=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.phosphorus=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and address LIKE "%"#{address}"%" and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and sendingPerson LIKE "%"#{sendingPerson}"%" and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and laboratorySignatory LIKE "%"#{laboratorySignatory}"%" and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and checkState = #{checkState} and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
limit #{page.start}, #{page.count}

select count(*) from t_pr_sewageregistration
or id like "%"#{keywords}"%" or address like "%"#{keywords}"%" or sendingPerson like #{keywords} or laboratorySignatory like #{keywords} or checkState = #{keywords} and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and t_pr_sewageregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_sewageregistrationitem where t_pr_sewageregistrationitem.ph=1 ) and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1

and address LIKE "%"#{address}"%" and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and sendingPerson LIKE "%"#{sendingPerson}"%" and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and laboratorySignatory LIKE "%"#{laboratorySignatory}"%" and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
and checkState = #{checkState} and t_pr_sewageregistration.water=1
mapper.insert: insert into t_pr_sewage (receiveDate, name, remarks, COD, oxygen, nitrogen, lye, PH, BOD5) values (#{receiveDate},#{name},#{remarks},#{cod},#{oxygen},#{nitrogen},#{lye},#{ph},#{bod5})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_pr_sewageregistration where water='0' ;

select * from t_pr_softwater order by receiveDate desc
limit #{start}, #{count}

select * from t_pr_softgeregistration
or id like "%"#{keywords}"%" or address like "%"#{keywords}"%" or sendingPerson like #{keywords} or laboratorySignatory like #{keywords} or checkState = #{keywords}
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.ph=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.turbidity=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.hardness=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.phenolphthalein=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.basicity=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.electricalConductivity=1 )
and address LIKE "%"#{address}"%"
and sendingPerson LIKE "%"#{sendingPerson}"%" and
and laboratorySignatory LIKE "%"#{laboratorySignatory}"%" and
and checkState = #{checkState}
limit #{page.start}, #{page.count}

select count(*) from t_pr_softgeregistration
or id like "%"#{keywords}"%" or address like "%"#{keywords}"%" or sendingPerson like #{keywords} or laboratorySignatory like #{keywords} or checkState = #{keywords}
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.ph=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.turbidity=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.hardness=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.phenolphthalein=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.basicity=1 )
and t_pr_softgeregistration.id in(select DISTINCT sampleinformationId from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where t_pr_softgeregistrationitem.electricalConductivity=1 )
and address LIKE "%"#{address}"%"
and sendingPerson LIKE "%"#{sendingPerson}"%" and
and laboratorySignatory LIKE "%"#{laboratorySignatory}"%" and
and checkState = #{checkState}
mapper.insert: insert into t_pr_softwater (receiveDate, name, relativeAlkalinity, dissolvedSolidForm, PH, alkalinity, hardness, electricalConductivity, remarks) values (#{receiveDate},#{name},#{relativeAlkalinity},#{dissolvedSolidForm},#{ph},#{alkalinity},#{hardness},#{electricalConductivity},#{remarks})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) FROM t_rp_productiondaily;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_rp_productiondaily;

SELECT * FROM t_rp_productiondaily ORDER BY nowTime DESC
limit #{start}, #{count}
SELECT * FROM t_rp_productiondaily WHERE id=#{id};

select * from t_rp_productiondaily
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by nowTime desc
limit #{page.start}, #{page.count}

select COUNT(*) from t_rp_productiondaily
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') ;
mapper.update: update t_rp_productiondaily set checkState=#{checkState} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select id from t_pr_sewageregistration order by nowTime desc;
mapper.insert: insert into t_pr_sewageregistrationitem(id,wastesCode, wastesName, sampleinformationId, ph, cod, bod5, o2, lye, n2,alkalinity,bicarbonate,nitrogen,phosphorus,turbidity,basicity,phenolphthalein,remarks,identifie) values (#{id},#{wastesCode},#{wastesName},#{sampleinformationId},#{ph},#{cod},#{bod5},#{o2},#{lye},#{n2},#{alkalinity},#{bicarbonate},#{nitrogen},#{phosphorus},#{turbidity},#{basicity},#{phenolphthalein},#{remarks},#{identifie})

insert into t_pr_softgeregistration (id, laboratorySignatory, sendingPerson, nowTime, address, clientId, checkState, advice) values (#{id},#{laboratorySignatory},#{sendingPerson},NOW(),#{address},#{client.clientId},'ToCollected',#{advice});

insert into t_pr_softgeregistrationitem( id, sampleinformationId, turbidity, hardness, ph, phenolphthalein, basicity, electricalConductivity) values (#{id},#{sampleinformationId},#{turbidity},#{hardness},#{ph},#{phenolphthalein},#{basicity},#{electricalConductivity})
mapper.select: select * from t_pr_softgeregistrationitem where sampleinformationId=#{id};

limit #{start}, #{count}
